content: Hello all, I want to use StructureMap to map QuestionnarieResponse to Bundle of Observations. In StructureMap.structure element I want to add Questionnarie, QuestionnarieResponse and Observation.Is it possible to add..I have seen the exmple of StructureMap. But It's not clear how to map. Can anyone explain what is the process of group element and what are the rules going on Rules element? Please explain me. Thank you

With StructureMap, your source would be QuestionnaireResponse and your target would be Bundle. Questionnaire wouldn't come into play at all beyond the fact that the linkIds present in the QuestionnaireResponse would be referring to questions defined by the Questionnaire. In terms of understanding rules and groups, have you looked at the tutorial? You might also find this presentation helpful.
